title: [LoL] Skin Idea: JuggerNautilus aka Riot Nautilus

embed.description: Download for bigger pic //I know, I know, the colors can give one eye cancer, but I'm not good in picking colors, sorry ^^' And jesus, I hope this idea ... [LoL] Skin Idea: JuggerNautilus aka Riot Nautilus

body: So Browsing DeviantArt and stumbled Across this. Its not my Own Work But i asked if i could post here on the owners Behalf! I Reckon A Riot Nautilus Skin Would look Awesome and the name JuggerNautilus is just perfect! so please Show Your Support For This Artist. and maybe riot will see this.

replies.body:
I don't know about explosions. 
What would fit better for riptide are smoke grenade explosions. 
You could add, aesthetically, smoke canisters/grenades on his armour. 

I don't think other Riot skins have explosion looking abilities. 

The smoke grenade riptides should look really cool with Graves's smoke canister.

Didn't think about that, but that's indeed a good idea!
I will change that as soon as possible.
Thanks for the response :)

- Rookie
